Projects

The Cloud Resume Challenge (this !)

This website was built to familiarise myself with AWS and DevOps. There's been a lot to learn, actually. I'd say I've spent 2 months (on and off) working on this project, although, only the tailend 2 weeks had considerable hours (after finishing that year at University). Now that it's here I'll continuously develop (and continuously integrate) new things.

I'm sure that at some point there will be the whole #! (hehe)

Engraved Keycap Website

This project was actually my first 'real project' as part of my A level computer science course. The idea was to create a website for a client whereby users could upload an image, select which keycap profile to use, click continue; and then my website would spit back out a 3D printable file of the image's outline embossed onto the keycap.

Due to some seriously old libraries and fiddly dependencies, this project is no longer in existence - although, I did write the full SDLC documentation so maybe one day it will be reborn in frankenstein's monster's form, dismantled and containerised

Stack
  • Bootstrap
  • Django
  • Python
